example_sentence_italian: Il silenzio della notte mi calma.
example_sentence_english: The silence of the night calms me.

example_sentence_italian: Esco dalla notte e vedo l'alba.
example_sentence_english: I come out from the night and see the dawn.
I study in the quiet nights.
I write poems on the nights.

example_sentence_italian: Con la notte arriva il freddo.
example_sentence_english: With the night the cold arrives.

example_sentence_italian: Con le notti lunghe leggiamo di più.
example_sentence_english: With the long nights we read more.
